department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: The contract related to the construction of highways, roads, railways and airfield runways has been cancelled.
full_summary:
# Tender Cancellation Notice

## Announcement Details
* **Reference Number:** PW-_PWD-009-7866
* **Solicitation Number:** F6839-225510/A
* **Publication Date:** 2022-09-07
* **Amendment Date:** 2022-10-28

## Notice
This request for proposal has been cancelled.

## Contract Details
* **Contract Value:** Not specified
* **Expected Start Date:** Not specified
* **Expected End Date:** Not specified

## The Contract
This request for proposal was to be submitted for national procurement to Public Works and Government Services Canada.  The contract is for the **Highways, Roads, Railways, Airfield Runways** category, and was open to bidders across Canada.

## Trade Agreements
This contract is subject to the **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**.

## Regions of Opportunity
This contract is intended for the **Newfoundland and Labrador** region.

## Contact Information
For more information, please contact:
* Dwyer, Alexandria
* Email: [alexandria.dwyer@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:alexandria.dwyer@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (709) 330-6330
* Fax: (709) 772-4603
* Location: John Cabot Building, 10 Barters Hill, P.O. Box 4600, St. John's, Newfoundl A1C 5T2

Note: All contact information has been kept as per your request but with minor rephrasing and minor formatting of contact information.



Honestly it looks like an internal document shared with you by the contractor. Is that correct? If so, I recreated the external tender announcement from this. Please see below:
